constraints.name: probability_distribution
constraints.description: 每个骰子投出点数的概率分布必须满足概率转移条件
constraints.formal: 对于所有 i, ∑(A(i, j) for j in [1, Q]) = 1

constraints.name: transition_probability
constraints.description: 从一个骰子转移到另一个骰子的概率分布必须满足概率转移条件
constraints.formal: 对于所有 i, ∑(B(i, j) for j in [1, N]) = 1

constraints.name: initial_probability
constraints.description: 初始选择骰子的概率分布必须满足概率转移条件
